name: BBC_NEWS__GET_TOP_HEADLINES
description: Fetches the top headline articles from the BBC News homepage for a specific international edition.

limit.description: The maximum number of headlines to return. Defaults to 10.

edition.description: The regional edition for the top stories ('int' for international, 'uk', or 'us'). Defaults to 'int'.

name: BBC_NEWS__GET_ARTICLES_BY_CATEGORY
description: Fetches the latest articles from a specific BBC News category.

category.description: The news category to fetch articles from (e.g., 'technology').

limit.description: The maximum number of articles to return. Defaults to 10.

name: BBC_NEWS__GET_ARTICLE_CONTENT
description: Fetches and reads the full text content of a single BBC News article from its URL.

url.description: The full URL of the BBC News article to read.
